info.+content: Despite Ryuji Takasu's gentle personality, his eyes make him look like an intimidating delinquent. Class rearrangements on his second high school year put him together with his best friend, Yusaku Kitamura, and his hidden crush, Minori Kushieda. Along with these two comes Kushieda's best friend, Taiga Aisaka. Her delicate appearance contrasts with her brutal personality. Secretly in love with Kitamura, Taiga agrees to help Ryuji with his love interest as long as he helps her get closer to hers.
#1: "Pre-Parade" (プレパレード) by Taiga Aisaka, Minori Kushieda, and Ami Kawashima (Rie Kugimiya, Yui Horie, and Eri Kitamura) (eps 2-16, 25)
#1: "Vanilla Salt" (バニラソルト) by Yui Horie (eps 1-16)
#2: "Orange" (オレンジ) by Taiga Aisaka, Minori Kushieda, and Ami Kawashima (Rie Kugimiya, Yui Horie, and Eri Kitamura) (eps 17-18, 20-25)
#3: "Holy Night" (ホーリーナイト) by Taiga Aisaka & Ami Kawashima (CV: Rie Kugimiya & Eri Kitamura) (ep 19)
"Holy Night" (ホーリーナイト) by Taiga Aisaka & Ami Kawashima (CV: Rie Kugimiya & Eri Kitamura) (ep 19)
テレビ東京・あにてれ とらドラ！
